exm.mng: to be precisely the same, to be no different
at one's wit's end, unable to find a way out
to follow the track of an overturned cart, to repeat a disastrous policy
to act in a way that defeats one's purpose (idiom)
Su Zhe (1039-1112), northern Song writer and calligrapher, one of 三苏 and one of 唐宋八大家
change of string, move out of rut (idiom); dramatic change of direction, to dance to a different tune
on the same track, in agreement, rhyming
former track, old rut, stuck in old conventions
